With each new memory, Aria's connection to the wind grows stronger, and she must learn to control her power before it consumes her.

As she learns to dance with the wind, Lyra becomes a master of the ancient art of Aeromancy, using her skills to heal the land and bring balance to the elements. But when a dark force threatens to disrupt the harmony of the wind, Lyra must use her newfound powers to save her world and restore the delicate balance of nature.
